news_header: Axis Capital reported $1.58 billion in revenue for Q4 2024, an 8.3% increase year-over-year, with an EPS of $2.97.
news_text: Axis Capital (AXS) reported a revenue of $1.58 billion for the quarter ending December 2024, marking an 8.3% increase compared to the previous year. The EPS was $2.97, slightly higher than last year's $2.94. However, the revenue was below the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.63 billion by 2.83%, while the EPS exceeded the consensus estimate of $2.68 by 10.82%. Investors are encouraged to analyze key financial metrics to better understand the company's performance.
